templates.content: Our standard flat-rate 10% shipping fee is based on your order total and covers the processing, handling, packing, and curbside delivery of your order. A $79 In-Home Special Care Delivery surcharge may apply to fragile and/or oversized items.
templates.name: How much does shipping cost?

templates.content: Absolutely, happy to help! Can you let me know what size were you looking for? How much seating did you need? What wood tone are you interested in? Did you have a budget you were hoping to stick to?
templates.name: Dining table recommendations

templates.content: We offer trade discounts to designers through our trade program. Signing up is quick and easy! Applications are reviewed and completed within 1 business day. You can find more information, as well as sign up here: https://kathykuohome.attn.tv/sl/MrT-enJA
templates.name: Do you offer designer discounts?

templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-888-908-2925 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.
templates.name: Phone support

templates.content: I'll be glad to look into this for you! Can you please confirm the item you're interested in and send me the competitors link along with your full name and shipping address since we only match in stock items after tax?
templates.name: Price Matching

templates.content:
Orders may only be canceled within 24 hours of your purchase. To cancel an order, log in to your account: https://www.kathykuohome.com/Account/Login?returnUrl=%2F and click 'My Order History'. Then choose whichever item you'd like to cancel. 

Please know that we're not able to process any cancellations once your item has been packaged and picked up for shipping, so these items will instead need to be returned upon delivery.
templates.name: Cancel / edit order

templates.content: Got you! I'd love to put you in touch with our design specialists to help you. Feel free to email cs@kathykuohome.com, call 888-908-2925, or chat with us here: https://direct.lc.chat/10204472/
templates.name: Design specialist

templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://www.kathykuohome.com/Service/Info/returnpolicy
templates.name: Return policy

templates.content: White-Glove is required for some of our items because they're heavy, fragile, or have large packaging. With our White Glove service, the items are brought to your room of choice and all packaging is removed and discarded for you. They'll take items up 1 flight of stairs if necessary to place them on the second floor of your home as well. It doesn't include any assembly service, but it can be added for $99 per item during checkout.
templates.name: What is White Glove delivery?

templates.content: Our items ship from all over the country! We work with over 200+ vendors around the states as we do not own inventory.
templates.name: Where do you ship from?

templates.content: Yes, we charge tax to Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Louisiana, Maryland, Michigan, North Carolina, New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Oklahoma,, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Texas, Virginia and Washington.
templates.name: Do you charge sales tax to specific states?

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at cs@kathykuohome.com or give us a call at 1-888-908-2925. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content:
Are you redesigning? I would love to put you in touch with our experts to help with this! Please share with us the answers to the questions below:

• Are you interested in learning more about our Design Services that we offer? https://www.kathykuohome.com/designservices/
• What style were you looking to achieve?
• Did you see any beds or nightstands you liked?
templates.name: If someone is looking for recommendations (ESC after)

templates.content: Are you part of our trade program? You can read more about it at the following link and get priority access to our design resources centers: https://www.kathykuohome.com/MyAccount/businessLogin I'd also recommend emailing us directly at trade@kathykuohome.com, and our team will be more than happy to help out!
templates.name: Shopping for a client

templates.content: If you have an account with us on our website, you can access your 'Order History' to see the latest estimated shipping date. You can log in here: https://www.kathykuohome.com/Account/Login?returnURL=/MyAccount/Order

templates.content:
Great question! Some of our manufacturers do hold orders for us, it just depends on who the vendor is. That said, how long will we have to hold the order for? What items are you looking to get and when would you want the order to ship?

I'll be glad to check with my team if the shipping can be delayed.
templates.name: Can I delay shipping / ship at a later date?

templates.content: Please send over the following information so my team can get to work on providing you with samples; IItem/ Sku #, Color/Finish, Shipping Address, Phone Number, Email Address, and Full Name.
templates.name: Sample requests (escalate)

templates.content: We would actually bring it up the elevator if the Premium White Glove shipping option is selected at checkout, however should you opt for free curbside delivery, the furthest they would bring it would be to the curb of the building, very rare do they bring it into a lobby/mailroom.
templates.name: I live in a condo/apartment, will the shipment get delivered to my door?

templates.content: We have quite a few vendors that don't participate in any of our sales so our codes won't work on their items. Our codes also won't work if an item is already discounted as discounts may not overlap.
templates.name: Why doesn't my discount work on some items?

templates.content:
Yes, you can schedule a consultation with a design services specialist here: https://kkhome.as.me/schedule.php 
During the consultation, you can tell us about your home project and we'll advise you on the best design package and interior designer for your needs. 

Please note that this service is only offered if you're interested in purchasing an interior design service package, not just a product recommendation.
templates.name: Do you offer interior design services?/I want to redesign several rooms in my home/building a new home

templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.kathykuohome.com/Product/Sale

templates.content: The invoice is from us, but the order will be packaged and shipped by the vendor. There's also no vendor pricing visible.

templates.content: We ship via UPS, USPS, FedEx, and DHL. We also do a lot of LTL shipments. Parcel delivery takes 3-7 business days after leaving the warehouse, Standard Truck delivery takes 2-3 weeks after leaving the warehouse, and Premium White Glove delivery takes 4-6 weeks after leaving the warehouse.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: Open Box furniture refers to our selection of designer furniture available at an exceptional value. This collection comprises like-new returns and open-box items from our warehouse, all of which are in excellent condition and guaranteed to be prepared for prompt shipping. You can check it out here: https://www.kathykuohome.com/Product/ProdGroup/Open-Box
templates.name: What is Open Box Furniture?

templates.content: We don't currently offer free shipping, but all promos will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.content: To request a return, go to the My Order History section of your Kathy Kuo Home account: https://www.kathykuohome.com/MyAccount/Order. Click the drop down menu under the Action column of the item you would like to return and select "Return."
